original_text:
This is the account of Terah’s family line.
Terah became the father of Abram, Nahor and Haran. And Haran became the father of Lot.
korean_text: 데라의 족보는 이러하니라 데라는 아브람과 나홀과 하란을 낳고 하란은 롯을 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: This is the account of Terah's family line.
Terah became the father of Abram, Nahor and Haran.
sentences.korean_translation: 데라는 아브람, 나홀, 하란의 아버지가 되었다.

sentences.original_text: And Haran became the father of Lot.
